body_html: @rasoolfa Perhaps you should rename this issue like memory in-efficiency in RNN rather than memory leaking. Although the memory usage is higher than expected, it doesn't(or you don't report yet) keep growing steadily w.r.t iterations.
body_text: @rasoolfa  Perhaps you should rename this issue like memory in-efficiency in RNN rather than memory leaking. Although the memory usage is higher than expected, it doesn't(or you don't report yet) keep growing steadily w.r.t iterations.
body: @rasoolfa  Perhaps you should rename this issue like `memory in-efficiency in RNN` rather than `memory leaking`. Although the memory usage is higher than expected, it doesn't(or you don't report yet) keep growing steadily w.r.t iterations.
